metadata.title: CVE-2018-8036 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - low
metadata.description:
In Apache PDFBox 1.8.0 to 1.8.14 and 2.0.0RC1 to 2.0.10, a carefullycrafted (or fuzzed) file can trigger an infinite loop which leads to an outof memory exception in Apache PDFBox's AFMParser.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-8036` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libfontbox-java - 1:1.8.15-1
libjempbox-java - 1:1.8.15-1
libpdfbox-java - 1:1.8.15-1
No subscription required

libfontbox2-java - 2.0.11-1
libpdfbox2-java - 2.0.11-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libpdfbox-java package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.8.15-1').
libpdfbox2-java package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.11-1').
